item.title: Troubling news for the teaching of evolution
item.description: [UPDATE: i remade the maps in green, hope that helps…] A recent survey reported in Science (“Defeating Creationism in the Courtroom, but not in the Classroom”) found that biology teachers in high school do not often accept the basis of their discipline, as do teachers in other disciplines, and thus may not teach evolution appropriately. Read more here: New York Times. I took a little time to play with the data provided online along with the Science article.
